alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued October 07 at 6:16AM AKDT until October 07 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas will flood, and significant erosion is expected. Damage to fish or hunting camps along the coast is expected. Some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Water will likely go across the road to Point Barrow and other low lying roads along the coast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to remain 3 feet above normal high tides this morning, and then begin to decrease this afternoon. Erosion will continue into this afternoon. Strong southwest winds will turn west and decrease this afternoon.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
